Description: Peavey lists the following: Guitar Specifications24 3/4" (629mm) scaleMahogany body and (*24-fret)neck with rosewood fretboard (*the neck looks more like maple to me)White bindingDouble-locking, Floyd Rose-licensed tremoloGrover® die-cast tunersBlock inlaysTwo extra-hot humbucking pickupsTwo volume controls and one tone controlThree-way, toggle-style pickup selector- Made in Indonesia A really nice player in good (+) shape for all kinds of styles after redoing the setup, a few dings in the body front and back, and minor grooves on the back of the neck you won't feel out of 1st position. Most of these are going for $500 and up here on eBay, even though they only listed for $699 originally. I couldn't tell whether they were the set or bolt-on necks in some cases, this is definitely a bolt-on with 2 humbuckers (they're not active, but passive- that cover on the back that looks like a battery compartment is the selector switch cover), but without pulling them out to check the backs, I don't know they're DiMarzios (stock) or not. I didn't get a case with this, I'll ship it in a gig bag, or for $125 more in a rectangular hard case.
Title: Peavey Rotor EXP, RED beauty! 2004 or '06, good condition
ConditionDescription: GOOD (+), some scratches and a ding or two on the body front & back, and 2 or 3 small divots on the neck you won't feel out of 1st position.Plays great, electronics are fine.
